name: Ammmu
greetingText: I really like your name SURAVI BR ( SUNSHINE )
wishText: Hope the candles on your cake light up the best smile I've seen. wish you all the happiness in life, and your birthdays always are lit up with dreams and stars!. A million extra wishes to you <3 . <-MY SUNSHINE
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and call me if you liked it. waitiing.....
replayText: click, if you want to watch it again.
